name: AllegriaHotel
0: ”Alexa, ask a. l. l. e. g. r. i. a. hotel”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. l. l. e. g. r. i. a. hotel
des:
"Allegria Hotel features an upscale restaurant and lounge, an infinity pool on the roof, complimentary fitness classes, and an enclosed rooftop for weddings, meetings, and more.

Ask us any query about our services: Rooms, Special Offers, Dining, Events, or Things to Do"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
